mosinstall.description: AkoForms is a fully integrated Mambo form generator component.

queries.query: CREATE TABLE `#__akoforms` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `title` text NOT NULL, `text` text NOT NULL, `sendmail` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '1', `emails` text NOT NULL, `savedb` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '1', `showresult` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '1', `published` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `publish_up` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `publish_down` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `ordering` float unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `target` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `targeturl` text NOT NULL, `thanktitle` text NOT NULL, `thanktext` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM

CREATE TABLE `#__akoforms_fields` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `catid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `type` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `title` text NOT NULL, `text` text NOT NULL, `value` text NOT NULL, `style` text NOT NULL, `required` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `published` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `publish_up` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `publish_down` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `ordering` float unsigned NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM;

CREATE TABLE `#__akoforms_data` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `senderid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `fieldid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `data` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM;

CREATE TABLE `#__akoforms_sender` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `formid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `senderip` text NOT NULL, `senderdate` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM;
